Gumdrop

Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime

MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) parsing utilities.

This package provides low-level parsers for MIME message formats, including RFC 822/5322 headers, RFC 2047 encoded words, and MIME multipart content.

Key Components

  • MIMEParser - Main parser for MIME messages and multipart content
  • MIMEHandler - Callback interface for parsed MIME parts
  • ContentType - Represents and parses MIME content-type headers
  • ContentDisposition - Represents content-disposition headers
  • Base64Decoder - Base64 decoding
  • QuotedPrintableDecoder - Quoted-printable decoding

Subpackages

  • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc2047 - Encoded word handling for non-ASCII text in headers
  • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc5322 - Internet message format parsing and generation

Features

  • Streaming parser for memory efficiency
  • Charset conversion with fallback handling
  • Quoted-printable and Base64 decoding
  • Multipart boundary detection
  • Content-type parameter parsing

Internal Use

These utilities are used internally by HttpServletRequest Part implementation for handling HTTP multipart/form-data requests, the mail server packages (SMTP, POP3, IMAP) and the mailbox package for message parsing and indexing.

Author:
Chris Burdess
See Also:
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc2047, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc5322
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MIMEHandler
    Receive notification of the logical content of a MIME entity.
    MIMELocator
    A locator enables the recipient of parsing events to be informed of where within the MIME entity a parsing event has occurred.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContentDisposition
    A MIME Content-Disposition value.
    ContentDispositionParser
    Parser for MIME Content-Disposition header values.
    ContentID
    A MIME content-id or RFC 5322 msg-id value.
    ContentIDParser
    Parser for MIME Content-ID and RFC 5322 Message-ID header values.
    ContentType
    A MIME Content-Type value.
    ContentTypeParser
    Parser for MIME Content-Type header values.
    MIMEParser
    A parser for MIME entities.
    MIMEParser.BoundaryMatch
    Result class for boundary detection that includes boundary match information.
    MIMEUtils
    Utility methods for MIME parsing and validation.
    Parameter
    A parameter in a structured MIME header value such as Content-Type or Content-Disposition.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MIMEVersion
    This enum represents a value for the MIME-Version header field.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MIMEParseException
    An exception indicating that a fatal error occurred during MIME parsing.
